item.name: _Compendium Version Info
item.text: Includes: Custom Spells, Monsters, Classes/Subclasses, Items from Homebrew Campaign

item.name: Blade of the Exile
item.text: This blade hums with a low vibration. On a critical hit, the target is knocked prone.
Proficiency with a longsword allows you to add your proficiency bonus to the attack roll for any attack you make with it.

item.name: Brew of Giants
item.text: When you drink this potion, your Strength score changes to 21 for 1 hour. The potion has no effect on you if your Strength is equal to or greater than that score.

item.name: Amulet of the Lost
item.text: While wearing this amulet, you have advantage on Wisdom (Survival) checks to navigate.
Curse. You cannot voluntarily remove this amulet.

item.name: Shadow Leather
item.text: The armor seems to absorb light. While wearing it in dim light or darkness, you can take the Hide action as a bonus action.
